user_management.create_user: INSERT INTO USERS (USER_ID, NAME, EMAIL) VALUES (:USER_ID, :NAME, :EMAIL)
user_management.update_user: UPDATE USERS SET NAME = :NAME, EMAIL = :EMAIL WHERE USER_ID = :USER_ID

inventory.update_stock: UPDATE INVENTORY SET QUANTITY = :QUANTITY WHERE ITEM_CODE = :ITEM_CODE
inventory.list_low_stock: SELECT * FROM INVENTORY WHERE QUANTITY < MIN_QUANTITY

reports.daily_sales: SELECT DATE, COUNT(*), SUM(AMOUNT) FROM SALES GROUP BY DATE
reports.monthly_summary: SELECT MONTH, COUNT(*), SUM(AMOUNT) FROM SALES GROUP BY MONTH
reports.top_products: SELECT PRODUCT_ID, COUNT(*) as COUNT FROM SALES_DETAILS GROUP BY PRODUCT_ID ORDER BY COUNT DESC
